title: my client is not loading/acting weird
body: my client is either getting stuck at the authenicating/loading to get onto the client step, or I log into the client and then nothing is loading and cannot play a game or anything. This just started today when I got home, everything was working fine yesterday and I have not made any changes to the game/my computer that I know of (unless league did some sort of auto update yesterday/today)

replies.body: Let's do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're still able to get a solid link with our servers. Pay extra attention to the steps on port forwarding, firewalls, and DNS, and let me know if that doesn't help.
oh, thanks for the reply (and sorry forgot I posted) turns out it was rito servers acting up, 1-2 hour later everything was fine again.
